prompts: Create a playful fairy-type Pokemon with fluffy white fur and green accents.
I want a whimsical Pokemon that resembles a cotton ball with tree-like features.
Generate a small, adorable Pokemon with a brown base and fluffy white cloud-like hair.
Make a Pokemon that embodies nature, with soft features and a friendly demeanor.
Imagine a creature that thrives in forests, sporting a light brown trunk and puffy white foliage.
Design a Pokemon that blends in with its grassy surroundings, featuring vibrant green elements.
Show me a cute, cuddly Pokemon with a mix of earthy and fluffy traits.
